name: Clan of Death
description:
Clan of death is a multiplayer traitor game for a lot of fun in a group of friends.

You play as the remnants of a Viking clan that must recover a legendary weapon, repair a ship and find supplies in an undead-infested fjord to sail away from this cursed place.
The players must prevent regular waves of the dead from destroying the ship and watch out for a traitor, who is among the group of Vikings and can transform himself into a cultist who rules over the dead and want's sabotage the Vikings' quest.

The Vikings have won as soon as all the errands have been completed and all the Vikings are at the ship to cast off.
The cultist wins as soon as all players have died or their ship has been destroyed by the undead.

Clan of death is perfect for an gaming evening with your squad.
